channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT8188, MT8195, MT8395, MT8781
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT8188, MT8195, MT8395, MT8781

item.title: CVE-2023-20844|2024-08-02T09:14:41.140Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6895%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys_cmdq, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing valid range checking. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07354058; Issue ID: ALPS07340121.
